main: ^Are you leaving with the others, Ezra?
^Why yes, indeed! I figure it's about time I got back to my work!
^I've been conductin' research on all manner of occurrences around Grimstone Valley. Things you'd never believe, Maria!
^I think I'd believe quite a lot.
^Well anyway, I'm itchin' to get out and continue my research! And Ruby's surely countin' down the hours til she's rid of me.
^It hasn't been so long since I brought you here. Have you recovered that quickly?
^Oh, you know me, Maria! I got more energy'n a steam engine. Little alien pickax to the gut? That's nothin'.
^And you drove all those monsters out! Ol' Ezra's free to roam now, get into as much trouble as I please.
^They might be gone now, but there's no telling if they'll be back.
^If'n they do, you'll just kick their asses back out again!
^Mm. I hpoe you're right about that.
^I'm always right, Maria! Eventually, at least.
^And to you! Don't go dyin' on us.
